work_experience.company: University of Michigan - Ziyou Song Lab
work_experience.title: Research Assistant
description: Conducting research on machine learning for second-life electric vehicle (EV) batteries
Focusing on modeling degradation mechanisms and predicting remaining useful life using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) data

work_experience.title: AI Engineer - Experienced Associate
description: Built self-service analytics platform using Javascript, Python and Claude LLM on AWS that converts natural language to SQL queries, reducing insight delivery time by 90%
Architected Master Data Management solution using PySpark on Databricks, consolidating disparate data sources into single source of truth
Developed AI-powered investigation assistant using Agentic AI and Vertex AI models achieving 96% accuracy, reducing investigation time 4x
Helped scale the organization 10x to 160+ employees while launching production Gen-AI and Data products

work_experience.title: Software Development Intern
description: Built automated validation tool for IP configurations, reducing setup time from hours to minutes
Established automated CI/CD pipelines with comprehensive testing, accelerating software delivery by 20%
Prototyped end-to-end management UX in Figma for fibre-WiFi users

templates.why_company: I am excited about {company} because of its innovative work in technology and its commitment to excellence. My background in {field} at {school} has prepared me well for this opportunity, and I am eager to contribute to {company}'s mission while growing as a professional.
templates.why_role: This {role} position aligns perfectly with my skills in {skills} and my passion for building impactful software. I am particularly drawn to the opportunity to work on challenging problems and collaborate with talented engineers.
templates.cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the {role} position at {company}. As a {degree} student in {field} at {school}, I have developed expertise in {skills}.

I am confident that my technical skills and enthusiasm make me a strong candidate for this role.

Sincerely,
{first_name} {last_name}
